survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Subscription-Based Book Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, satisfaction levels, and pain points related to subscription-based book services (e.g., audiobooks, eBooks, physical book rentals).

questions.question_text: Which of the following subscription-based book services have you used in the past 12 months?
answer_options: eBook services (e.g., Kindle Unlimited, Kobo Plus)
Physical book rental services (e.g., Book of the Month)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes to allow multiple selections. Ensure the options cover major market players.

script.question_text: Which of the following subscription-based book services have you used in the past 12 months?
answer_options: eBook services (e.g., Kindle Unlimited, Kobo Plus)
Physical book rental services (e.g., Book of the Month)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current primary book subscription service?
questions.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is not 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include an option for respondents who don't currently use a service.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current primary book subscription service?
script.routing_logic: Display if Q1 answer is not 'None of the above'

questions.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a book subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text follow-up

script.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a book subscription service?

questions.question_text: How much do you typically spend monthly on book subscription services?
answer_options: I don't use book subscription services
questions.client_notes: Use a graduated scale to capture spending ranges typical for this market.

script.question_text: How much do you typically spend monthly on book subscription services?
answer_options: I don't use book subscription services

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in book subscription services?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will provide qualitative insights for service improvement.
